fields.summary: iOS: Provide API to support opt-out of Analytics at runtime

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.

issuetype.description: A new feature of the product, which has yet to be developed.

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.description:
We need a sample app for our 7.2.0 release that demonstrates some GDPR features that we offer, e.g.:
- Opting out of Analytics (simple UI with some buttons to send typical events + a switch to opt out and a console)
- AdMob: Show a consent dialog to define the user consent
